Those who wonder why the key is too short, once you start the keygen with admin rights you first hit the patch button then you extract the key.

Hey, im also having the same trouble with the key being too short. I follow the steps exactly like this.

1)Open up xf-maya2013_x64 as admin (UAC disabled also)
2)click patch
3) copy paste the request code in the top blank space.
4) click generate.
5) copy paste the bottom key into the maya activation code.
